text: Chisimu Asilamu wachilume ni wachikongwe, wakulupilila wachilume ni wachikongwe, wakunda malamusi wachilume ni wachikongwe, wakuwecheta yakuona wachilume ni wachikongwe, wakupilila wachilume ni wachikongwe, wakutetewala (pameso pa Allah) wachilume ni wachikongwe, wakutola sadaka wachilume ni wachikongwe, wakutawa (swaumu) wachilume ni wachikongwe, wagosa utukani wao wachilume ni wachikongwe, wakunkumbuchila Allah kwejinji wachilume ni wachikongwe, Allah walinganyichisye wanganyao chikululuko kwisa soni malipilo gamakulungwa nnope
